attributes.action: Stop Soya farms selling beans to large brands such as KFC or Dairy milk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Soya bean farms destroy an area of rainforest the size of Britain every year, this has to stop. The beans are bought on a huge scale by fast food companies and chocolate producers despite the fact there are alternatives these countries continue to destroy our world.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
